mapper.insert: insert into missionDB.Mission (name, reward, childId) value (#{name}, #{reward}, #{childId});
mapper.select: select id, name, reward, status, childId, DATE_FORMAT(createDate, '%y.%m.%d') AS createDate, DATE_FORMAT(doneDate, '%y.%m.%d') AS doneDate from missionDB.Mission where id = #{id};
